flawed_nl_solution:
The total ratio representing the number of photos in the Malachi gallery is 10+17=<<10+17=27>>27
The difference in the ratios representing the number of photos Malachi took this year and last year is 17-10=<<17-10=10>>10.
This year, Malachi took 10/27*2430= <<10/27*2430=900>>900 more photos than he took last year.
#### 900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
